description.value:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 19, Ultimate Combat pg. 134

Statistics

Cost 5 gp Weight 8 lbs.

Damage 1d6 (small), 1d8 (medium); Critical x2; Range -; Type P; Special brace, monk

Category Two-Handed; Proficiency Martial

Weapon Groups Monk; Polearms; Spears

Description

This long, tridentlike weapon consists of a three-pronged metal fork set upon an 8-foot-long shaft. It is wielded much like a staff, with the wielder grasping the shaft from the center and jabbing with its forked end. A tiger fork can be set to receive a charge.
